welcome.message: Hi, my name is Dillan Khurana. I am a fourth year Computer Science and Math student at UVA with industry experience at Amazon Web Services, Alarm.com, and 10Pearls. I work as a full stack engineer and a machine learning researcher focused on Looped Transformers and multimodal audio models. This is my portfolio project. I hope you like it. Type 'help' any time for commands. My dog Lucy will guide you if you get stuck.

projects.name: DillAgent
projects.description: Agentic AI framework for building production ready workflows on top of any LLM.
features: Abstractions for LLMs, tools, agents, and executors
Support for RAG, tool use, and multi step planning
Signal based workflow system for complex agents

projects.name: Demon Time
projects.description: Interview prep platform with roadmaps, spaced repetition, and daily scheduling.
features: Full Docker and Nginx deployment on EC2 with CloudFront

projects.name: Sound Sift
projects.description: Desktop app for music producers to search samples with audio and text embeddings.
features: Indexes local sample libraries with embeddings
Local embedding storage for fast private lookup

projects.name: Gig Grid
projects.description: Band management app for rehearsals, setlists, and practice streaks.
features: Cloud backend with real time updates

projects.name: Fruit Freshness Classifier
projects.description: CNN model that predicts fresh or rotten produce in UVA dining halls.
features: CNN trained on labeled produce images
Evaluated with accuracy, precision, recall, and F1
Project focused on improving food quality at UVA

projects.name: CtrlPhi
projects.description: Reinforcement learning and control playground for reproducing classic algorithms.
features: Implements bandits, gridworlds, and TD control
Reproduces key figures from Sutton and Barto

experience.description: Worked on Amazon Q and tooling for build notifications and developer workflows.
achievements: Built an MCP server for Amazon Q CLI
Created React and Python dashboard for regional build alerts
Reduced engineering overhead by automating repetitive checks

experience.description: Evaluated multimodal LLM generated deterrent messages for smart cameras.
achievements: Built Azure pipeline for data collection and labeling
Integrated system with quality engineering tools

experience.description: Developed tools for pharma clients to track high risk statements from opinion leaders.
achievements: Fine tuned models for sentiment and stance detection
Built React and FastAPI dashboard backed by MySQL

research.title: Exploring Chain of Thought and In-Context Learning in Looped Transformers
research.abstract: Research project studying how looped Transformer architectures can emulate multi step reasoning and in context gradient like learning.
findings: Implemented GPT2 style model and trained on sequence data
Explored effects of repeated hidden state passes on reasoning
Connected results to questions about generative AI in education
